column5: Apart my regular fishing around or not to far from home I got 2 trips booked (maybe more to come) In june we are going to the: http://www.domaineshannon.com/rates.html and at the end of August it's with the SEPAQ at the reservoir Giroux: https://www.sepaq.com/rf/lvy/ and maybe another trip to Air Tamarac at Lake Hebert In February it's: Montreal Boat Show and the Hunting & Fishing how. Looking forward to meet friends and talk about fishing.
